Comment.value:
Class Customizations:
 
Legendary DC Bonus: 
Every four levels over 40 Wizards receive a +1 to their spell DCs to a maximum of +5.

Epic Spell Progressions: 
Wizards now receive a bonus spell slot to all spell levels for 4 epic levels.
